artefact: Licence for regulated scientific procedures on protected animals

artefact.overview: You need a licence to do experimental or scientific procedures on protected animals
artefact.licence_short_description: Licence to do experimental or scientific procedures on protect animals in the UK.
artefact.licence_overview:
To undertake experimental or scientific procedures applied to protected animals, a personal and project licence is required from the [Home Office.](http://www.homeoffice.gov.uk "Home Office"){:rel="external"}

Any place where such work is carried out must also be designated as a scientific procedure establishment.
